features: 8 tournament bracket formats (Single/Double Elimination, Round Robin, Swiss, etc.)
Automatic match progression with mathematical formulas
ELO rating system with position-based rewards
results: 80% reduction in manual tournament management time
Production deployment to real billiards clubs
Positive user feedback and rapid adoption
